channel.title: Server Npc's and more (people who comment click this)
channel.description:
ok i got a bunch of questions
1) i look at videos about adding, removing npc's and it doesn't work they stay their like glued bricks. 2) i changed the start inv and it is still the same. 3) i try to change home location and it stays their like glue. 4) How do you make npc's talk please tell me the files called and more. I also compile source and then compile client and it doesn't work no matter what. I save the text docs. :'( ??

item.title: Server Npc's and more (people who comment click this)
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

OK WELL THIS COULD BE THE PROBLEM DID U COMPLIE? IF U DID, DID IT GIVE U ANY ERROR? DID IT SAY PATH CANNOT BE SPECIFIED OR SOMETHING? IF SO THAT IS THE REASON. IF THAT IS NOT THE CASE IT COULD JUST BE THAT THE SERVER U ARE USING IS NOT SUPPOSE TO BE CHANGED.

Read full topic

tell us how the guides don’t work stating errors and so forth. Also, please try to use better grammar so your understandable.

I only understood like 2 sentances in your thread.

[quote=“pkk1n6b0ss, post:1, topic:466520”]ok i got a bunch of questions

  1. i look at videos about adding, removing npc’s and it doesn’t work they stay their like glued bricks.
  2. i changed the start inv and it is still the same.
  3. i try to change home location and it stays their like glue.
  4. How do you make npc’s talk
    please tell me the files called and more. I also compile source and then compile client and it doesn’t work no matter what. I save the text docs. :’( ??[/quote]

check out your compiler it’s probably not compiling everything.

item.title: Server Npc's and more (people who comment click this)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Please be more specific in describing your problems. They’re very vague and you don’t give us enough information. Which Revision are you using as a Base? Do you know if your Java Compiler is functioning correctly? Are you updating the correct files? etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Npc's and more (people who comment click this)

item.title: Server Npc's and more (people who comment click this)
item.dc:creator: @justinmperry justinmperry
item.description:
@justinmperry wrote:

When you compile, does it sit there blank for a moment, and then say click to continue, or does it say the path can’t be specified or something like that? If you does say it can’t be found, then you need to edit the compiler to your java location. If you need help, add and message me on Skype. iamjmperry

Read full topic
